text: @realDonaldTrump 40,000,000+ unemployed, 105,000+ victims of covid-19 and all you can do is talk about conspiracy theories and your magic 8 ball predictions for the economy. gasing american citizens for a photo op. comparing yourself to Abraham Lincoln. you need to seek medical attention NOW!!!!!
